alert.note: Alert for Mahoning (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Portage, Trumbull and Mahoning Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 307 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Ravenna to near Sebring to Carrollton. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. Low hanging clouds can also appear to move up and down at times, but they will not show signs of any rapid rotation. An actual funnel cloud will exhibit spinning in a counter-clockwise direction. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Warren, Salem, Columbiana, Boardman, Niles, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Cortland, Newton Falls, Sebring, Lordstown, Kinsman, Vienna Center, Leavittsburg, Hilltop, Maplewood Park, Austintown and Struthers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
